tasks.label: clean-unnecessary-files
tasks.command:
set -e
# Remove macOS DS_Store files and pycache
find . -name .DS_Store -delete || true
rm -rf __pycache__ */__pycache__ || true
# Keep tests and CI, but remove setup.py if not used as a package
# Commenting out to avoid breaking packaging; will only print its presence
[ -f setup.py ] && echo "setup.py present" || true
# List remaining tree summary
find . -maxdepth 2 -print | sed -e 's/^\.\///' | sort | head -n 200
